ai-ne29:1.1_0: Herein, what is the word origin of the dwelling?
ai-ne29:2.1_0: “Right thought, the mind should be rightly understood”,
ai-ne29:2.2_0: mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, and mind are liberated.
ai-ne29:2.3_0: “With thoughts of renunciation, good will, and harmlessness.” (There is) that they have no thought of renunciation, for it is to say that this is:
ai-ne29:2.4_0: “ right view is aim of right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-ne29:2.5_0: he is free from shaking off his wretched state,
